projectDescription: This project is a modern clone of a music course website built with Next.js, showcasing a responsive and clean UI. Designed with a focus on user experience, the clone replicates a professional music education platform suitable for all skill levels. This project highlights my frontend development skills, attention to UI/UX, and ability to build engaging, real-world web interfaces.

projectDescription: This is a role-based task management web application designed to streamline employee task assignments and tracking. The system features a secure login that differentiates between admin and employee users using localStorage. Admins can assign tasks to employees and monitor progress, while employees can view tasks by status (New, In Progress, Completed), accept tasks, and update their status through intuitive CRUD operations. The application ensures efficient collaboration and task transparency within an organization. Built with a focus on user experience and productivity, it provides a clean UI and essential functionality for small to mid-sized teams.
